welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded successfully. You may need to refresh or navigate to see all changes.
login.descDefault: Log in to your Kratia account to continue.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: A verification email has been sent to {{email}}. Please verify your email before logging in.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found in our records after authentication.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue accessing your profile. Please try again later.
login.error.invalidCredentialsGeneric: Invalid credentials. Please check your email/password.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.error.genericFail: Login failed. An unexpected error occurred.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: Could not complete Google Sign-In. Profile issue: {{reason}}.
login.error.googleCancelled: Google Sign-In was cancelled by the user.
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
signup.title: Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Apply to become a member of our self-regulated community.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself and why you'd like to join Kratia Forums (min. 50 characters). This will be part of your admission request.
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Please fill in your presentation (min. 50 characters) before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Rules and Conditions.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: Please agree to the Rules and Conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use. Please try logging in or use a different email.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters long.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
signup.error.genericFail: Signup failed. An unexpected error occurred.
signup.error.googleSignupFailed: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.
signup.error.googleCancelled: Google Sign-Up was cancelled by the user.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email. Please try logging in.
signup.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-Up failed. An unexpected error occurred.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred after Google Sign-Up. Please try logging in.
signup.error.userSanctioned: User {{username}} is currently sanctioned and cannot create new applications.
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox to activate your account.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please write your presentation before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: Please agree to the Rules and Conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: An account with this email already exists. Please try logging in.
forgotPassword.descDefault: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: A password reset link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: If an account exists for {{email}}, a password reset link has been sent.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verify Your Email
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Action Required
confirmPage.default.description: Please follow the instructions provided or contact support if you're unsure how you reached this page.
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.

adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.title: Confirm Forum Deletion
adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the forum "{{forumName}}"?
This action only deletes the forum document. Associated threads and posts will not be deleted but will become orphaned.

proposeConstitution.accessDenied.title: Access Denied

proposeConstitution.toast.noChanges.desc: The proposed constitution text is identical to the current one. No changes submitted.
proposeConstitution.votationDescription: Proposal to modify the site's Constitution. Justification: {{justification}}

proposeConstitution.toast.success.descri: The votation for "{{proposalTitle}}" has been created in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.toast.error.descript: Failed to propose constitution change. Please try again.
proposeConstitution.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to modify the community's Rules and Conditions. Your proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.form.proposalTitlePl: e.g., Update to Article 3 regarding Karma System
proposeConstitution.form.justificationPl: Explain why these changes are needed and how they will benefit the community.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextPla: Paste the complete, modified text of the constitution here.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextHel: Please ensure this field contains the ENTIRE proposed text of the constitution, not just the changed parts.
proposeConstitution.importantNotice.desc: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora. Ensure your proposed text is final and your justification is clear.

Proposal to sanction user **{{username}}** for a duration of **{{duration}}**.

**Justification:**
{{justification}}

This proposal is now subject to community votation in this Agora thread.
